sentences.en: ...some other abstract notation system like a computer language.
sentences.cn: …一些如计算机语言的其它抽象符号系统。

sentences.en: A more convenient notation will now be given.
sentences.cn: 现在将给出一种较为方便的表示法.

sentences.en: He made a notation on his engagement calendar.
sentences.cn: 他在约会日程上作了记载.

sentences.en: He recognizes enough notation to be able to follow a score.
sentences.cn: 他认得足够多的乐符，看懂乐谱不成问题。

sentences.en: However, this streamlined notation can be confusing as explained below.
sentences.cn: 然而,如下所述, 这种简化了的符号容易引起混乱.

sentences.en: Music has a special system of notation.
sentences.cn: 音乐有一套特殊的标记法.

sentences.en: Musical notation was conceived for the C major scale and each line and space represents a note in this scale.
sentences.cn: 乐谱为C大音阶而构思，在这个音阶中的每一个线和间都代表一个音符。

sentences.en: Notation for PL changes from one implementation to the next.
sentences.cn: PL的表示方法将随实现方法的不同而有所改变.

sentences.en: Notation may also increase the memory value of a classification scheme.
sentences.cn: 标记符号也可以增进分类体系的助记程度.

sentences.en: The advantage of this notation is that it is unambiguous.
sentences.cn: 这种记号的优点在于它不会混淆.

sentences.en: The suggestive notation has been chosen purposely.
sentences.cn: 这个有启发性的符号是特意选择的.

sentences.en: This delay notation has been adopted.
sentences.cn: 已经采用了这种延时符号.

sentences.en: This is a good time to switch to the classical notation.
sentences.cn: 此刻是换用经典符号的好时候.

sentences.en: Those are expressly designed to illustrate the vagaries of Leibnizian notation.
sentences.cn: 那些是用来说明莱布尼兹记号的巧妙想法.

sentences.en: Using binary notation is in fact just manipulating ones and noughts.
sentences.cn: 使用二进制标号法实际上只运用1和0两个数.
我们很有必要规定一些记号.

sentences.en: We shall find it convenient to adopt the following notation.
sentences.cn: 采用下面的记号是方便的.

words.tran_cn: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a system of written marks or signs used to represent something such as music, mathematics, or scientific ideas
